item.title: Copy command error?
item.dc:creator: @souph souph
item.description:
@souph wrote:

[code][code=]if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                   playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
        playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
                   playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
        playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
                   playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
        playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
                   playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
        playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
                   playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
        playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
                   playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
        playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
                   playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
        playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
                   playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
        playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
                   playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
        playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
        setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
        pGender = p.pGender;
        pHead = p.pHead;
        pBeard = p.pBeard; 
        pTorso = p.pTorso;
        pArms = p.pArms;
        pHands = p.pHands;
        pLegs = p.pLegs;
        pFeet = p.pFeet;
        pHairC = p.pHairC;
        pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
        pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
        pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
        pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
        sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                   } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Copy command error?
item.dc:creator: @kickyamom50 kickyamom50
item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:12, topic:363816”][quote author=ug1yw4t3rm3l0n link=topic=460059.msg3365765#msg3365765 date=1286759277]
Int hair didnt work -__________- rep–
[/quote]

face palm, it’s not just int Hair, you need to add a semicolon.[/quote]
Hey, if this is called “Server Help” I don’t think that we should be telling people, “Not spoonfeeding” Seriously, we would get alot more people if our members weren’t lazy and just psoted everywhere on server help saying, “Not Spoonfeeding” just for post count…

item.title: Copy command error?
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

client.java:11964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11965: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11965: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11966: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11966: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ client.java:11968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ client.java:11979: package Server does not exist Player p = Server.playerHandler.players[i]; ^ client.java:13008: p is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String) client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex ]; ^ client.java:13030: p is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String) client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex ]; ^ client.java:13051: p is already defined in customCommand(java.lang.String) client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex ]; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 14 errors Press any key to continue . . .

I declared what you told me to under the closing of the command. It gave me that error. any idea?

Read full topic

item.title: Copy command error?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“ug1yw4t3rm3l0n, post:15, topic:363816”]client.java:11957: '.class' expected pHead = int Hair; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

No, you don’t add it there, you need to listen better.

When you declare a variable it is on a different line, you don’t do what you did. I suggest just declaring p. so that it uses the variables from the Player Class, like so

Player p = Server.playerHandler.players[i];

Read full topic

item.title: Copy command error?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“ug1yw4t3rm3l0n, post:13, topic:363816”]pHead = p.pHead;

Where exactly do i put in int hair?? cuz i had the semi colon[/quote]

You need to define it like so, “int Hair;” or “int Hair = o;”.

now my error is

client.java:11964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11965: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11965: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11966: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11966: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ client.java:11968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. item.title: Copy command error?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You need to define what p. means unless you have the variables in the class that the code is in, also for sM you need to again define what sM is or change it to what ever yours is called, it might be sendMessage.

Read full topic

item.title: Copy command error?
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

So this is the code i got off a tut/snippet.

[code] if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                   playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
		playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
                   playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
		playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
                   playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
		playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
                   playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
		playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
                   playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
		playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
                   playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
		playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
                   playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
		playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
                   playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
		playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
                   playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
		playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
		pGender = p.pGender;
		pHead = p.pHead;
		pBeard = p.pBeard; 
		pTorso = p.pTorso;
		pArms = p.pArms;
		pHands = p.pHands;
		pLegs = p.pLegs;
		pFeet = p.pFeet;
		pHairC = p.pHairC;
		pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
		pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
		pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
		pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
		sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to copy..");
            }
        }[/code]

This is the error i get from my compiler

client.java:11964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11964: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pHairC location: class client pHairC = p.pHairC; ^ client.java:11965: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11965: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pTorsoC location: class client pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC; ^ client.java:11966: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11966: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pLegsC location: class client pLegsC = p.pLegsC; ^ client.java:11967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11967: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pFeetC location: class client pFeetC = p.pFeetC; ^ client.java:11968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ client.java:11968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pSkinC location: class client pSkinC = p.pSkinC; ^ client.java:11969: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+"."); ^ client.java:11973: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("The name doesnt exist."); ^ client.java:11976: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("Try entering a name you want to copy.."); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 13 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Thanks whoever helps

Read full topic
